lead_paragraph: Four weeks after fires hit Fort McMurray, Alberta, officials issued a long list of safety warnings and faced questions about whether the gradual return was premature.

headline.print_headline: First Residents Return to Fort McMurray After Fire
headline.main: First Residents Return to Fort McMurray After Wildfire

snippet: Four weeks after fires hit Fort McMurray, Alberta, officials issued a long list of safety warnings and faced questions about whether the gradual return was premature.
abstract: Some residents of Fort McMurray, Alberta, return for first time since they were forced to flee city due to wildfires; officials give residents long list of warnings and recommend cautionary measures until city returns to normal operations.
